questions.area_of_focus: Section 1: UN and WFP Security Policy Implementation
questions.question: Further to any TESS technical guidance/support mission in country, has the TESS assessment report been made available to SMT and Security Cell members in country?
questions.help_text: TESS providing onsite and remote guidance/support to field operations in country and can produce a TESS assessment compiling recommendations. As per the SMOM guidelines on SCS, the UNSMS in country is encouraged to adopt and implement the TESS assessment recommendations. While this is not the sole responsibility of WFP, we could leverage WFP’s participation in the SC and the SMT to advocate for the implementation of the TESS assessment recommendations.
